title: Need keystrokes for changing sessions / tabs
author: yrebrac
body_snippet:
Switching between sessions seems to be an entirely mouse-oriented task. 

## Expected Behavior

Being an app that is often used for CLI, there should be a keyboard option to switch between open sessions / tabs.
In my case I switch between session very frequently, and it's a major way in which mremoteng is worse than just having multiple putty windows open (that and the focus / alt-tab issues).

## Current Behavior

Have to take hands off keyboard and click with mouse, which is orders of...

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Implement keyboard shortcuts for switching between open sessions/tabs to enhance user navigation and productivity.
Approach: Add keydown event handlers to FrmMain to detect keyboard shortcuts (e.g., Ctrl+Tab, Ctrl+Shift+Tab). Use the pnlDock (DockPanel) to programmatically activate the next or previous ConnectionWindow (tab).
